title: Non-Verbal Hypnosis in time of Covid 19 / Dr Paret
description:
Non-verbal hypnosis is the basis for stronger and more effective hypnosis. Here Dr Paret induces a deep hypnotic state which leads the subject to liberation through a Mesmeric Crisis. Dr Paret's non-verbal techniques permit to reach the deepest self.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
